title: HOUR 2 - Right/Wrong & Kansas City Finally Turns a Corner
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right/Wrong & Kansas City Finally Turns a Corner
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another edition of Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Also, former NFL offensive lineman and current FOX Sports NFL analyst/radio host Geoff Schwartz joins Colin to explain how the Kansas City Chiefs have gone on an impressive winning streak utilizing their defense, why the Packers are more impressive than Colin thinks, the dynamic Cowboys, and more! Finally, Colin dissects how the Kansas City Chiefs turned their season around after a slow start.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
